structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY CLASSIFICATION, BOUNDARIES, AND ALTERNATIVE METHOD OF CONSOLIDATING GOVERNMENTAL SERVICES

law.catch_line: Obligations and special taxes are unimpaired.
law.text: A merger or consolidation shall not impair contractual obligations of either of the combined cities. Tax levies authorized for the payment of interest and the retirement of bonds or to create sinking funds for such purposes shall continue to be levied and collected over the same area by and for the new governing body in accordance with the laws under which the levies were originally made until all bonded obligations of the old city have been retired.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 6, effective March 25, 1960.
